## Developer Guide

If you are new to using `nbdev` here are some useful pointers to get you
started.

### Install my_first_nbdev_project in Development mode

``` sh
# make sure my_first_nbdev_project package is installed in development mode
$ pip install -e .

# make changes under nbs/ directory
# ...

# compile to have changes apply to my_first_nbdev_project
$ nbdev_prepare
```

## Usage

### Installation

Install latest from the GitHub
[repository](https://github.com/Manjunath-Yelipeta/my_first_nbdev_project):

``` sh
$ pip install git+https://github.com/Manjunath-Yelipeta/my_first_nbdev_project.git
```

or from
[conda](https://anaconda.org/Manjunath-Yelipeta/my_first_nbdev_project)

``` sh
$ conda install -c Manjunath-Yelipeta my_first_nbdev_project
```

or from [pypi](https://pypi.org/project/my_first_nbdev_project/)

``` sh
$ pip install my_first_nbdev_project
```

### Documentation

Documentation can be found hosted on this GitHub
[repository](https://github.com/Manjunath-Yelipeta/my_first_nbdev_project)’s
[pages](https://Manjunath-Yelipeta.github.io/my_first_nbdev_project/).
Additionally you can find package manager specific guidelines on
[conda](https://anaconda.org/Manjunath-Yelipeta/my_first_nbdev_project)
and [pypi](https://pypi.org/project/my_first_nbdev_project/)
respectively.
